title: The Choice of Luthien (1R100)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gondor
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Tale. Plays to your support area. Maneuver: Exert Aragorn to heal Arwen, or exert Arwen to heal Aragorn.
Lore:	”'But she chose mortality, and to die from the world, so that she might follow him; and it is sung that they met again beyond the Sundering Seas….'”
Rarity:	R
